title: The Silver Scream 2: Welcome to Horrorwood
description: The Silver Scream 2: Welcome to Horrorwood is the upcoming sixth studio album by the American metalcore band Ice Nine Kills, scheduled to be released on October 15, 2021 via Fearless. This album is the follow-up and sequel to the band's previous album, The Silver Scream, which was inspired by horror films. This album will also be inspired by horror films and features guest vocalists such as Jacoby Shaddix, George "Corpsegrinder" Fisher, Brandon Saller, Ryan Kirby and Buddy Nielsen. On the 9th of each month leading up to the album's release, a new single and accompanying video will be released to promote the album. As with the previous album, each of the videos are based on the films that the tracks were written about, while also having an overall story arc across the sequence of videos.
